articles.author: Maitree Baral
articles.title: Signs that tell your body needs Vitamin D
articles.description: Vitamin D helps maintain bone health by absorbing calcium. Deficiency of Vitamin D not only weakens bone density it also triggers other complications.
articles.content: Research studies have shown the relation between vitamin D and depression. Season depression, occuring during winters, is also said to be due to lack of vitamin D.
